content:
DataGridDesigner Class

Definition

Extends design-time behavior for the DataGrid Web server control.

In this Article

[System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControl(true)]
public class DataGridDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

Constructors

DataGridDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the DataGridDesigner class.

public DataGridDesigner ();

Properties

AutoFormats

Gets the DesignerAutoFormatCollection object associated with this designer.

public override System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection AutoFormats { get; }
Value
DesignerAutoFormatCollection

The DesignerAutoFormatCollection associated with this designer.

Methods

CreateTemplateEditingFrame(TemplateEditingVerb)

Creates a template editing frame using the specified verb.

protected override System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame CreateTemplateEditingFrame (System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb verb);
verb
TemplateEditingVerb

The TemplateEditingVerb for which to create the template editing frame.

Returns
ITemplateEditingFrame

A template editing frame.

Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources used by the DataGridDesigner object and optionally releases the managed resources.

protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

true to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only the unmanaged resources.

Remarks

When the disposing parameter is true, the Dispose method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this DataGridDesigner object references.

GetCachedTemplateEditingVerbs()

Gets the cached template editing verbs available to the designer.

protected override System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb[] GetCachedTemplateEditingVerbs ();
Returns
TemplateEditingVerb[]

An array of TemplateEditingVerb objects consisting of the cached template editing verbs that are available to the designer.

GetDesignTimeHtml()

Gets the HTML markup used to represent the DataGrid control at design time.

public override string GetDesignTimeHtml ();
Returns
String

The HTML markup that is used to represent the DataGrid control at design time.

GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml()

Gets the HTML markup used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.

protected override string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml ();
Returns
String

The HTML markup used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.

GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(Exception)

Gets the HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.

protected override string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (Exception e);
e
Exception

The exception that occurred.

Returns
String

The HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception.

GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty(String)

Gets the data item property of the template container.

public override string GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty (string templateName);
templateName
String

The name of the template.

Returns
String

The data item property of the container of the template.

Remarks

The GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty method is obsolete. To access the template metadata, see TemplateDefinition.

GetTemplateContent(ITemplateEditingFrame,String,Boolean)

Gets the content of the template.

public override string GetTemplateContent (System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame editingFrame, string templateName, out bool allowEditing);
editingFrame
ITemplateEditingFrame

The ITemplateEditingFrame from which to get the content.

templateName
String

The name of the template.

allowEditing
Boolean

true if the template's content can be edited; false if the content is read-only.

Returns
String

The content of the template.

GetTemplatePropertyParentType(String)

Gets the Type object corresponding to the parent of the specified template.

public override Type GetTemplatePropertyParentType (string templateName);
templateName
String

The name of the template.

Returns
Type

The Type corresponding to the parent of the specified template.

Remarks

The GetTemplatePropertyParentType method is obsolete. To access the template metadata, see TemplateDefinition.

Initialize(IComponent)

Initializes the designer with the specified DataGrid control.

public override void Initialize (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);
component
IComponent

The control element being designed.

OnColumnsChanged()

Called when the columns of the template change.

public virtual void OnColumnsChanged ();

OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged()

Called when the template editing verbs change.

protected override void OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged ();

SetTemplateContent(ITemplateEditingFrame,String,String)

Sets the content for the specified template and frame.

public override void SetTemplateContent (System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame editingFrame, string templateName, string templateContent);
editingFrame
ITemplateEditingFrame

The ITemplateEditingFrame to set the content for.

templateName
String

The name of the template.

templateContent
String

The new content for the template.
